summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4813 for the improvement of 38th avenue from East Olive Street to East Howell Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55569, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
